articles.title: Actor Lindsey Pearlman found dead after going missing in L.A. - CTV News
articles.description: Actor Lindsey Erin Pearlman, who had roles in 'General Hospital,' 'American Housewife' and other shows, was found dead days after she was reported missing in Los Angeles, authorities said.

articles.title: ‘We’re in danger of forgetting’: congressman’s warning 80 years after Japanese American incarceration - The Guardian
